Taskrunner

The taskrunner keeps all the pieces of our application running as well as a system to receive commands that run on demand.

Options

  • Grunt
  • Gulp

Research and testing had Gulp beat out Grunt, proving to be 5 times faster at running tasks.

Choice: Gulp

### Features * Faster task compilation (only writes to disc at end) * Less code to write * More javascript-like written instructions
